menu_structures.notes: Main menu → category submenus. "Go back" option calls the shortcut itself.
Ask for numeric code → conditional check → only show submenu if correct. Simple access control pattern.

input_collection.notes: Classic search pattern: collect query, build URL, open in browser. Uses getvariable to retrieve the ask result for URL construction.
Number input used as passcode. Conditional checks against hardcoded value.

run_workflow_patterns.pattern: Each menu case → single runworkflow call. Hub does NO processing, just routing.
run_workflow_patterns.notes: Pure delegation pattern. Hub is lightweight (60 actions). All intelligence in sub-shortcuts.

self_referential_patterns.usage: Last case in nested submenu calls the shortcut itself to return to main menu
self_referential_patterns.notes: Common pattern for multi-level menu shortcuts. "Go back ↩️" → runworkflow(self)

app_launcher_patterns.pattern: Menu case → openapp with specific bundle ID
app_launcher_patterns.notes: Password-protected menu reveals access to apps not on home screen.

third_party_intents.notes: Shazam-like music recognition. Check result with conditional, extract text, show notification.
